column4: another question:I installed ubuntu server edition on an old computer in order to install then fluxbox on it.Once installed the OS, do I have only to install via apt-get fluxbox and its dependencies?
just do the server install and apt-get install xserver-xorg fluxbox <-- that should do the trick
but u probally want firefox vlc xmms and a fileexplorer like rox konqeuror or nautilus aswell ;)
